<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Breath of the Dragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1945) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 169 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dragon Disciple](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=56)

**Prerequisites**
[Dragon Disciple Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1940)

</column>

---

You can use a powerful breath weapon, much like the dragon you emulate. You gain the [_dragon breath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=499) sorcerer bloodline spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. If you already have a focus pool, increase your number of Focus Points by 1.
name: Breath of the Dragon
